name: Mahjong Royal Towers Free
description:
Play Mahjong and experience royal generosity for yourself!
Complete over 100 unique levels in 6 locations, earning points and trophies. Climb the achievement ladder and the royal treasury will fling its doors open!
Playing Mahjong, you’ll have the opportunity to visit different parts of the royal castle – from the Garden and the Armory all the way to the Throne Room!
Special golden tiles can also be found on each level, and are worth many more points than usual. Golden tiles shake up the gameplay and are an extra attractive touch to the visuals.
Levels vary too: there are the classics, as well as layouts with ‘wandering tiles’, in which the arrangement changes with every new attempt.
